law.catch_line: Offer or acceptance of donations to sheriff's office -- Exemption from charges of bribery.

text.section: If a sheriff responds to an offer to receive a donation of money or goods made available to the sheriff's office, then that action in itself shall not constitute a violation of KRS 521.030. If a sheriff accepts a donation of money or goods in accordance with the provisions of KRS 61.310, that acceptance in itself shall not constitute a violation of KRS 521.020 or 521.040.
The offering of a donation of money or goods to the office of the sheriff in accordance with the provisions of KRS 61.310 shall not in itself constitute a violation of KRS 521.020 or KRS 521.040.

law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 103, sec. 2, effective June 20, 2005.
